session.title: Simulation for L&T Technology Services Synthetic Data Project Contract
session.jurisdiction_note: Contract terms based on L&T Technology Services policies, with adjustments for local compliance requirements.

timeline.title: Contract Signing
timeline.description: Project initiation with defined deliverables and payment terms
timeline.detailed_description: Upon signing, both parties agree to the project scope, deliverables, and payment schedule. Initial data access and AI model setup commence.
risks: Late payment penalties apply after 15 days

timeline.title: First Milestone Delivery
timeline.description: Delivery of initial synthetic data models by Day 30
timeline.detailed_description: First set of synthetic data models must be delivered and validated. Payment of ₹50,000 due upon acceptance.
risks: Rejection risk if quality standards not met

timeline.title: Mid-term Review
timeline.detailed_description: Comprehensive review of project progress, data quality, and compliance with agreed benchmarks. Second payment of ₹75,000 due.
risks: Project termination if benchmarks not met

timeline.title: Final Delivery
timeline.detailed_description: Final synthetic data system delivery, including all documentation and validation reports. Final payment of ₹100,000 due.
risks: Final acceptance subject to quality audit

timeline.title: Warranty Period End
timeline.description: End of 12-month warranty and support period
timeline.detailed_description: All support and warranty obligations conclude. Final project sign-off required.
risks: Extended support may incur additional costs
